text: Barauli is a town and a notified area in Gopalganj district in the state of Bihar, India. thumb ==Geography== Barauli is located at .Falling Rain Genomics, Inc - Barauli It has an average elevation of 65 metres (213 feet). ==Demographics== India census, Barauli had a population of 34,643. Males constitute 49% of the population and females 51%. Barauli has an average literacy rate of 41%, lower than the national average of 59.5%; with 64% of the males and 36% of females literate. About 20% of the population is under 6 years of age. ==References== Category:Cities and towns in Gopalganj district, India
title: Barauli, Bihar
